page.title: GalaBigShop Widgets Demo
page.content:
Demo EM Slideshow Widget

{{widget type="slideshow2/slideshow2" slideshow="1"}}
 

Demo EM Featured Products Widget

Grid View

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="4" item_spacing="10" thumbnail_width="280" thumbnail_height="280" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_grid.phtml"}}

Grid View with column count = 2

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="6" column_count="2" item_spacing="10" thumbnail_width="280" thumbnail_height="280" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_grid.phtml"}}
 

List View

{{widget type="dynamicproducts/dynamicproducts" order_by="name asc" featured_choose="em_featured" limit_count="3" thumbnail_width="200" thumbnail_height="200" show_product_name="true" show_thumbnail="true" show_description="true" show_price="true" show_reviews="true" show_addtocart="true" show_addto="true" show_label="true" choose_template="em_featured_products/featured_list.phtml"}}
